items.sentence: How much longer is Tom planning to live in Boston?
I don\'t think that there\'s anyone who hates Tom.
Do you have any idea what Tom was doing in Boston?
Mary has been wearing blue dresses a lot recently.
I\'ve got to stop Tom from doing something stupid.
I\'ve heard Tom is really good at speaking French.
I\'ve never been able to beat Tom at table tennis.
I don\'t think you could ever do that by yourself.
Tom decided to see if he could get into that club.
Every boy in the class wanted to sit next to Mary.
